body: Design, use, and programming of spreadsheets and data bases with applications from a range of disciplines.(Credits: 4)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: 2 entrance units in mathematics)(Additional Attributes: Bachelor of Arts: Quantification)

title: CMPSC 203: Introduction to Spreadsheets and Databases
